wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant General Sir John Gordon Lorimer,  is a senior British Army officer, who served as the Chief of Joint Operations and the Defence Senior Adviser to the Middle East and North Africa. He was appointed Lieutenant Governor of the Isle of Man on 29 September 2021.
